Configuration.Name: L1=10m_L2=2m_central
Configuration.SetupScript:
config.wavelength = 6 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 #config.wavelength_spread = 0.064 config.det = 1500 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g4' config.apx = -72 config.bs = 3 config.beamcenterx = 91.39 config.beamcenterz = 96.16
config.drive()
